column2: X became angry in ELA for a reason we were not able to establish. He was running around the building and broke the water dispenser and be gan to get physical with support. He stated he was calm and ready to go into a calming room
column3: finish his work and start his LSI. When he got there he asked for another walk
column4: since he was unsafe before support told him he had to stay in the calming area. He started spitting at staff
column5: he then put the rope of his sweatshirt around his neck
column6: trying to choke himself. Support intervened and held him in a restrain
column7: during that he was trying to hurt himself further by biting 1/27/21 11:00 AM on his fingers
column8: and then started to bite the staff around him.
